sentences.en: Life as a whole is better if you go slowly, and take the time to savor it, appreciate every moment. That’s the simplest reason to slow down.
sentences.cn: 如果你行进的慢一些，生活就是完整的，会让你感觉更好，花时间去欣赏它，欣赏每一个时刻，这就是为什么要慢下来的最简单的原因。

sentences.en: In other words, when parts of the community go away for a while, which is inevitable on any long-lived project, the community as a whole has to be strong and diverse enough to survive.
sentences.cn: 换句话说，当社区的一部分人离开一段时间时（这在任何长期项目中都是必不可避免的），社区作为一个整体必须足够强壮和多样化才能生存。
